title: Using free riot skins allowed?
body: I was wondering if using custom riot skins, so official skins that only you can see is allowed? Are normal custom skins allowed? Also what skins programs does riot allow, if any?

replies.body:
Custom skins fall into the **use at your own risk** category of third party programs, as it's difficult to ensure there aren't hidden features in the programs that offer them. If a program has the potential to offer you a *competitive advantage*, that's generally when we'll look at taking action on it. For more info, check out our full [Terms of Use.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse)

Let me know if you have any questions.

I'm not OP but I could really use some help on my position here. My account was permanently suspended for third party programs. I used custom skins and from what I have heard, the only legitimate program that can get you suspended was MKJogo. I have used it before, but not after the warnings that were sent out beforehand. Anyways, to go into more detail, I have made 3 forum posts over the past few months with lots of comments, views and upvotes without a Riot response. I feel like my ban was really unwarranted and it really hit me with depression knowing that I have basically loss all my progress and money I had put into that account. So I am here on the forums because this is really the best way to communicate with riot and I have seen many receive help here from similar situations like mine. Thank you in advance
